value: The cremation ritual took place in a common ustrinum, located in the nearby area of Los Cenizales, about three hundred meters west of Las Ruedas. It is estimated that around twenty-four generations of Vaccean and Roman Pintians might have been buried in the cemetery, which could therefore contain more than one hundred thousand graves.
What was the main funerary ritual of the Vaccaei in the necropolis of Las Ruedas?|Cremation with personal belongings
